item.title: Music Practice Diary - 27th Sept 2020
item.description: This week is on K310 1st movement (progressing) and the Tempest sonata.

item.title: Music Practice Diary - 14th Sept 2020
item.description: 这周依旧Mozart Sonata in A minor, K310. 1st Movement

item.title: Music Log 2: About music practices and flat fingerings
item.description: So I am trying out Notion, so far it looks ok. With all the fancy templates it looks like it can do much more than Bear, but I have also heard rumors about how it can get pretty messy after you have a lot of stuff. It’s free for personal use anyway so I thought I want to give it a try, at least the table structure is pretty useful for me.

item.title: Music Log 1: About my recent obsession with Chopin Etude Op.10 No.1
item.description: So this week I was pretty serious in my piano practices, played for one hour everyday except on Friday, it has become an important part of my daily routine.
